titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd before the societies for reformation of manners in Dublin, October the 4th, 1698 by Tho. Emlyn.
titleStmt.author: Emlyn, Thomas, 1663-1741.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Andrew Crook for Math. Gunne and Josiah Shaw,

notesStmt.note: "Published at the desire of the said societies."
Reproduction of original in the Trinity College Library, Dublin.
